name: Dangle
description:
My submission for Curdle Jam #2! 

This game is kind of like Heave-Ho, except you can't Heave or Ho, only Dangle ;)

Use of a controller is highly recommended for the best playing experience. It currently has keyboard and xbox controller support.

Note: If you experience any frame rate drops, it is because this game is currently doing a large amount of physics calculations and still needs optimization.

Thanks for playing, enjoy!
